result.execSummary:
The defendant Daysha T Rhodes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: *Fine of $200.00 including all mandatory costs, surcharges and fees to be paid from bail on deposit. DNA sample has been obtained from the defendant.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daysha T Rhodes

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Daysha T Rhodes in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.


Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered. 


Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 7 DAYS  in the House of Correction, with credit for 7 DAYS  time served. 

Fine of $200.00 including ALL MANDATORY COSTS, SURCHARGES AND FEES  to be paid FROM BAIL ON DEPOSIT 

Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant. 

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Daysha T Rhodes in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests a Plea Hearing. Court granted defense request. Case adjourned to branch 47.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.

15RM030926  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
06-10-15

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Sport's Authority 5850 North Bayshore Drive, Glendale
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Daysha T Rhodes in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  Defendant Daysha T Rhodes in custody.  Joanne L Hardtke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
